trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 colorless Sliver creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: Create two 1/1 colorless Sliver creature tokens.

trans-unit.source: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Colossal Whale attacks, you may exile target creature defending player controls until Colossal Whale leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
trans-unit.target: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Colossal Whale attacks, you may exile target creature defending player controls until Colossal Whale leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

trans-unit.source: {T}: Each creature attacks this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Each creature attacks this turn if able.

trans-unit.source: Even the thrums, the lowliest of slivers, become deadly in its presence.
trans-unit.target: Even the thrums, the lowliest of slivers, become deadly in its presence.

trans-unit.source: {T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb. {T}, Sacrifice Ratchet Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Ratchet Bomb.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb. {T}, Sacrifice Ratchet Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Ratchet Bomb.
